data.title: FTX Repayments Will Start In Next 2 Weeks After Long Wait
data.description:

data.title: Justin Sun: Li Lin concealed due diligence materials when selling Huobi, and there was a $30 million hole inside
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: Sun Yuchen posted on X: People who are familiar with the situation know that Li Lin concealed the due diligence materials at the time (when selling Huobi) and created a hole of 30 million US dollars inside. In the end, I discovered his tricks. After being exposed, he cheated and refused to give me the last cent, so I lent it to the company to fill it.

data.title: War Against Crypto Not Dead As Digital Asset Developers Still Being Prosecuted: Lawyer John Deaton
data.description:
Digital asset lawyer and advocate John Deaton says the “war against crypto” isn’t dead despite the recent shift in US presidential administrations. Deaton says on the social media platform X that there are still important cases going on even though Gary Gensler isn’t running the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) anymore. The lawyer notes […]
The post War Against Crypto Not Dead As...
source: https://dailyhodl.com/2025/02/04/war-against-crypto-not-dead-as-digital-asset-developers-still-being-prosecuted-lawyer-john-deaton/

data.title: Goldfinch launches Prime Funding Pool to provide users with on-chain private credit investment opportunities
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News Goldfinch, a DeFi protocol backed by a16z Crypto and Coinbase Ventures, has launched a new fund pool called "Prime" to provide users with on-chain investment opportunities in private credit fund giants.
Goldfinch Prime will provide non-US investors with investment opportunities in thousands of loans from private credit companies including Apollo Global Management, Ares Management and Golub Capital, which together manage more than $1 trillion in assets.
The Goldfinch Prime fund pool adopts a continuous open model, allowing users to invest at any time. After investors deposit USDC stablecoins, they will receive GPRIME fund pool tokens, which represent their proportional share in the fund pool. The target net return rate of the fund pool is 9% to 12%. (The Block)
